name: Baka Prase
description:
'''Bogdan Ilić''' ({{lang-sr-Cyrl|Богдан Илић}}; born 16 September 1996), better known as '''Baka Prase''' ({{lang-sr-Cyrl|Бака Прасе|lit=Grandma Pig}}), is a Serbian internet personality, entertainer and musician. He is a former professional ''[[League of Legends]]'' player, winning numerous local and regional championships.

He was also the founder of the Serbian brand known as ŠAIM SE which is currently closed. Ilić's YouTube channel name comes from the preschool cartoon ''[[Peppa Pig]]''.
